message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to start at $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $90. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $95?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $92?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $96?
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still willing to negotiate. How about we meet at $94?
I'm glad we're getting close to a deal! I'm willing to meet you halfway between $94 and $96. How about we meet at $95?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $93?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $95, as that's my minimum price to make a profit. However, I'm willing to make one final compromise. How about we meet at $94.50?
I understand that you're trying to make a profit, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $94, but no higher. Can you meet me at that price?
